3.「やい お前っ！| なぁんで こんな所で 寝てやがるっ！！: Hey, you!|What're you doing, sleeping in a place like|this?!

4.「あとちょっとで 狙ってた素材を| 奪えるとこだったのに！| お前のせいで 逃げ: I was so close to getting the ingredient I was|after! It's your fault it got away!!

6.「……ひっでえ ツラしてやがんな。| まるで この世の終わりでも| 見てきたかの: You've got an awful look on your face.|Like you just saw the end of the world...

7.「はあ？| エテーネの村が 大変だって！？: What's that?|You're saying Ethene Village is in trouble?!

9.「お前 海から流れ着いた 流れモンだな？| にしちゃあ こんな海から離れた所で|: You must've drifted here from across the sea,|huh? Although if so, it's odd that I found you|lying so far from the ocean...

10.「ここは 絶海の 小さな孤島だ。| あるのは ナルビアって町が ひとつっきりで|: This is a small, isolated island in the middle|of the sea. There's only one town here,|Nalbia. I've never heard of Ethene Village.

11.「起きられるんなら すぐそこの| ナルビアの町に行きな。流れモンだからって| 冷: If you can stand, head for the town of Nalbia|nearby. Don't worry, it's not a place where|they'd act cold just because you're a drifter.

12.「今度 ジャマしたら タダじゃおかねえぞ！: If you ever get in my way again, you won't get|off so easy!

14.「んんっ？ 誰だ お前！？: Huh? And just who are you?!

15.「お前は…… 外で転がってた 流れモンだな？| 勝手に オレの家に 上がり込んで: You're... that drifter I found lying around|outdoors, aren't you? What do you think you're|doing barging into my house?!

16.「……なるほど。その釜に 興味を持ったのか。| どこのウマのホネとも 知れねえヤ: ...I see. So you're interested in that pot?|Well, I don't know where you're from, but|you've certainly got a good eye!

17.「その釜は 我が家に伝わる 錬金釜だ。| 錬金術を使うためには 欠かせない| オ: That's our family's traditional Alchemy Pot.|It's a magic pot that's indispensable for|alchemy. It's more important than my own life!

18.「そして その錬金釜こそが 錬金術師の証！| つまり このオレこそが 選ばれし存: And that Alchemy Pot is the mark of an|alchemist! In other words, I'm one of the|chosen few... Alchemists are rare nowadays!

19.「……あぁん？ なんだって？| 錬金なら自分もできるって 言ったか？: ...Huh? What's that?|You say you can perform alchemy too?

20.「テキトーなこと 抜かすんじゃねえ！| なら 証拠に 上やくそうを錬金してみやが: Stop talking nonsense! Then why don't you try|alchemizing Strong Medicine as proof?! You at|least know the recipe for that, don't you?

22.「まさか 上やくそうのレシピも 知らねえのか？| そんなんで よくも 錬金できる: Don't tell me you don't know the recipe for|Strong Medicine? How dare you call yourself an|alchemist if you don't even know that?!

27.「さあ オレの錬金釜で| 上やくそうを 錬金してみろ！| 本当に やれるもんなら: Now, use the Alchemy Pot to alchemize a Strong|Medicine! If you really can do it, let's see|it!

29.「す…すげえじゃねえか！| なんで お前に 錬金ができるんだ！？: I... incredible!|How are you capable of performing alchemy?!

30.「はぁ？ 今まで 箱で錬金してたって？| 箱に魔力が宿るなんて 聞いたこともねえ: Huh? You've been alchemizing with a box? I've|never heard of a box with magical powers. To|think you can use alchemy with just that...

32.「オレも すこし前までは この釜を使って| なんでも 錬金できたんだ。それが……: I used to be able to use this pot to alchemize|anything I wanted. Then, one day... I suddenly|couldn't do it anymore.

33.「釜が ぶっこわれたせいだと思い込んでいたが| おかしくなったのは…… 釜じゃな: At first I thought it was because the pot was|broken, but it wasn't the pot that was broken,|it was me.

34.「おい ウマのホネ！| お前に 頼みがある！: Hey, drifter!|I need you to do something for me!

35.「メラゾ熱にかかって 死にかけてる オレの娘| ……リリオルを 治すクスリを|: My daughter, Lyriol, is dying of Mellazo|Fever. I need you to alchemize a cure for her!

39.「メラゾ熱ってのは 大昔の 恐ろしい病気だ。| オレが 素材集めなんか手伝わせた: Mellazo Fever is a horrible disease from long|ago. I got Lyriol into this mess because I|asked her to gather materials for me...

40.「頼む！ オレに代わってクスリを錬金してくれ！| 材料の めざめの花と レッドベ: Please! Alchemize the cure in my place! The|ingredients, Wakerobin and Buzzberries, are|both easy to find nearby!

41.「や…… やってくれたか！| すげえぞ ウマのホネ！: Y... you did it!|That's amazing, drifter!

42.「さあ そのクスリを オレにくれ！| すぐに リリオルに飲ませよう！: Come on, give me that cure!|I'll have Lyriol take it right away!

48.「リリオル クスリだぞ。| さあ 飲め。: Lyriol, I've brought medicine.|Come on, drink.

50.「……呼吸が すこし おだやかになってきた。| さっそく クスリが効いたんだな。: ...Her breathing is a little more relaxed now.|Seems like the cure's already taking effect.

55.「お前は 娘の命を救ってくれた 恩人だ。| これからは ウマのホネだなんて| 失: You saved my daughter's life.|After this, I can't keep calling you something|rude like "drifter", can I...?

56.「……よし！| これから お前のことは| 宿ナシと 呼ばせてもらうぜ！: ...Alright! From now on, I'll call you|Pilgrim!

57.「たいした もてなしは できないが| クスリを作ってもらった 礼がしたい。| 今: I can't offer much by way of hospitality, but|I'd like to thank you for making that cure.|Please, stay at our house tonight.

59.<center>リリオルの病状は 目に見えて 落ち着いてゆき|イッショウと <k: <center>Lyriol's condition was visibly improving, and|eventually Issho and <kyodai> fell asleep|too.

61.「おい 宿ナシ！ 起きてくれ！| メラゾ熱のクスリが効いて| リリオルが 元気に: Hey, innkeepers! Wake up! Liriodur's feeling|better now that the melanzo fever medication|has kicked in!

62.「お前のおかげだ。| なんと 礼を言っていいか……。: Your... I don't know how to thank you.

63.「ぜひ リリオルにも あいさつしてやってくれ。: Please say hello to Liriodur for me...

64.「父から 聞きました。| あなたが 私のクスリを 作ってくれたと……。: My father told me... He told me that you were|the one who made my medication.

65.「クスリがなかったら 私は あと数日のうちに| 命を 落としていたそうです。|: If it weren't for the drugs, I'd be dead in a|matter of days. Thank you for saving my|life...

66.「お前が いてくれて 本当に助かった。| もし リリオルまで失うことになったら|: I'm so grateful you're here. If I had lost|Liriodur, too... I don't know what I would|have done.

67.「なあ 宿ナシ。| お前 いったい どこから来た？| どうして あんな所で 倒れ: Hey... Where the hell did you come from? Why|were you lying there?

68.<kyodai>は 故郷の エテーネの村が襲われ|気づいたら この島にいたことを: <kyodai>When the village of Etaine was attacked, I|found myself on this island...

70.「<kyodai>って エテーネの人なの？| 私 エテーネの村のことを 知ってる: <kyodai>You're from Etaine? I know about the village|of Ethene!

71.「ほら これを見て！| すこし前に拾った ボトルレターなの。: Hey, look at this! A bottle letter I picked|up a while back...

72.「ボトルレター……？| そういや前に 海で 手紙が入ったビンを| 拾ったとかなん: Bottle letter...? Well, you said something|about finding a bottle with a letter in it in|the ocean.

74.「いつか このエテーネの村で| いちばん幸せな カップルになろうね……って。: One day, we'll be the happiest couple in the|village of Etaine. .....

75.「う～ん 確かに 書いてあるかもしれねえが| それだけの内容じゃ エテーネの村が: Hmm... it may be written, but I don't know|where the village of Etaine is...

76.「でも きっと そんなに遠くないよ！| だって このビンが 割れないで| 流れ着: But it can't be that far! Because this bottle|washed ashore without breaking!

77.「ねえ <kyodai>。うちで暮らしなよ！| エテーネの村の場所が わかるまで: hey<kyodai>. Come live with us! Until we find out where|Etaine's village is, you can stay with us...

78.「……はあ？| てめえ 勝手に決めてんじゃねえ！| この家の主は オレだ！: ... Huh? You don't get to decide what you|want! I'm the owner of this house!

79.「お父さんは もう錬金できないんでしょ？| なら <kyodai>が代わりに 錬: Your father can't alchemize anymore, can he?|Then...<kyodai>It would be better for everyone if you used|the smelting pot instead!

80.「て…… てめえっ リリオル！| 元気になったとたん 言いたい放題だな。| この: What the... Damn you, Liriodur! Now that|you're back on your feet, you're gonna be|saying... You bastard!

81.「そういうわけで お父さんのことは| 気にしなくていいから よろしくね！| <k: That's why you don't have to worry about your|father. It's nice to meet you!<kyodai>！

82.「くっそう！| よくも そこまで オレを無視して| 話を 進められるもんだな！: Damn it! How dare you ignore me like that and|go on with your story!

83.「……おもしろくねえが しょうがねえ！| うちに 置いてやってもいいが ちゃんと: ... It's not funny, but it's what I do! I'll|let you stay at my place, but you're gonna|listen to me, okay? No place to stay!

84.「……いや 待てよ。| 住む家が 決まっちまったとなると| お前のこと もう 宿: ... No... Now that you've found a place to|live, I can't call you a homeless person|anymore...

85.「……よし！| これから お前のことは| イソーローと 呼ばせてもらうぜ！: ... Yes! From now on, I'll call you Thoreau.

86.「ありがとう お父さん！| お父さんなら きっと| 賛成してくれると思ったわ<h: Thank you, Dad! I knew you'd agree with me.<heart>

87.「やい イソーロー！ オレの錬金釜を| 使わせてやるんだから キビキビ はたらけ: Hey, Thoreau! I'm letting you use my smelting|pot, so work hard! I won't stand for it if|you slack off!

88.「この町で 錬金に はげんでりゃあ| いずれ 故郷に帰るための手掛かりが| 見つ:
If I keep working on my alchemy in this town,|there will come a day when I can find a clue|that will lead me back home! That's just a|
|hunch!

89.「よかったわね <kyodai>。| 故郷に帰れるように 私も 応援するからね！: Good for you<kyodai>I'll support you! I'll support you so you can|go home!

104.「では さっそく アバさまに| この豆を お見せしてこよう。| ……そなたは こ: Now, let's show Miss Ava these beans... ...|And you wait here...

105.「ア…… アバさまっ！ 大丈夫ですか？| しっかりなさってください！: A... Ava! Are you okay? Stay with me, please!

106.「カメさまの お告げの 救世主が| あの ふしぎな豆の本をもとに| このような豆: The Turtle told me that the Savior of the|world would create these beans based on the|book of magic beans.

110.「なっ なんじゃ この豆！？| めちゃくちゃ うまいでは ないかっ！！: What's with the beans? They're so good!|They're so good!

111.「もぐもが もぐもぐ……。| じゅるっ…… もがっ まめっ うまっ！！: Moxie, moxie, moxie... Slurp... Mogga,|blister, yum!

113.「ぶっはぁっ！ うまかったあ！| チカラが みなぎってきたわい！: Huh! It was so good! I've got the energy!

114.「見ておれ……！| 今の わしにかかれば これしきの儀式| またたく間に 終わら: Watch me... Now that I'm here, I can finish|this ritual in no time!

115.「なんだったのだ あれは……？| あれが…… あの豆の チカラなのか！？: What was that? What was that? That's... Is|that the power of the bean?

122.「カメさまの お告げにありし 救世主のチカラで| 長きに渡った 継承の儀式は終わ: The Turtle has spoken, and by the power of|the Saviour, the long-awaited rite of|succession is complete!

123.「さあ！ 新たなる巫女を 皆で迎えるのじゃ！！: Come on! Let us all welcome the new|priestess!

124.「おおっ…… 新たなる巫女さま バンザイっ！| アバさま バンザイっ！！: Oh... Hail the new miko! Banzai, Ava-sama!

125.「わが名は アバ！| 新たなる巫女として エテーネの民を| 導く者なり！！: My name is Ava! I am the new priestess who|will lead the people of Etaine!

126.「わしは 巫女として| エテーネの民たちに 新しき道を 示そう！: I'm a priestess and I'll show the people of|Etaine a new way!

127.「この豆 めちゃくちゃ うまい！| 皆で このふしぎな豆を 育てるのじゃ！！: These beans are so good They're so good We're|gonna grow these amazing beans together

128.「なんと！ 見たこともない豆じゃ。: Oh, my God! I've never seen...

129.「このふしぎな豆は わしに チカラを与え| 儀式の最後のカベを 越えさせてくれた: This mysterious bean gives me the power to|cross the final threshold of the ritual. I'll|take this bean...

130.「ハツラツ豆と 名付ける！: I'm gonna call them "Hot Toddy Beans.

131.「ハツラツ豆……？| あの豆が アバさまを 救ってくれたのか！？: Beans...? Those beans saved Ava's life?

132.「ありがたい豆なんだねえ。| この地でも たくさん収穫できるよう| 皆で 大事に: Thank goodness for these beans. Let's all|work together to grow enough beans to last us|a lifetime.

133.「ふっふっふっ。これで ハツラツ豆が| いつでも 食べられるようになるわい。: Mmm-hmm. Now you can have your Happy Beans|whenever you want.

134.「アバ！| 大事な話を 忘れておるじゃろう。| <kyodai>のことを 皆に: Ava! You forgot the most important thing...<kyodai>I'm gonna have to explain to them what the|hell is going on!

136.「皆に 紹介しよう！| この ハツラツ豆を作ってくれたのが| ここにいる <ky: I want to introduce you all. I'm here to|introduce you to the man who made these|lentils.<kyodai>Bye.

137.「カメさまの お告げの通り| わしが 新たなる巫女となるために| チカラを尽くし: The turtle told me to do everything in my|power to make me a new priestess!

138.「わしは 村の救世主 <kyodai>に敬意を表し| エテーネの民のひとりとして: I am the savior of my village<kyodai>I welcome you as one of the people of|Etaine... I hope you all get along!

140.「ふう……。| これで わしも 肩の荷が下りたわい……。: Hmm... I'm relieved of my burden now...

150.「ゴルルルゥ。におう……におうぞォ！| こいつは 錬金術師の においだなァ！？: Gol... I smell... I can smell it! That's the|smell of an alchemist, isn't it?

151.「オレ様を こんなほこらに| 閉じ込めやがった 錬金術師ィ！| ゆるさん……ゆる: The alchemist who locked me in this cave! I|won't let you... I'll never forgive you!

152.「我は この世を絶望で満たすために| はるか死の世界より 訪れし者……。: I have come from a world far from death to|fill this world with despair...

153.「せっかく ひとりの 有能な錬金術師から| その能力を消し去ったというのに すぐ: Just when I thought I'd erased the abilities|of one talented alchemist, a new one appears.

154.「貴様も あの錬金術師のように| 我に 錬金術師としてのチカラを捧げよ！| そし: You, like the alchemist, must give me your|alchemical powers! And once again you will|taste the despair of death!

155.「どうだい ボクのキンキラの身体。| すっごい錬金術師が 作ってくれたんだよ。: What do you think of my sparkly... It was|made by the most amazing alchemist...

156.「知ってるよ。キミも錬金術師なんだろ？| ここまで来た人は 本当に ひさしぶりで: You know... You're an alchemist, aren't you?|It's been a long time since anyone's come|this far, and I'm so happy...

157.「さあ キミのチカラを見せてほしいな。| それが ボクのお仕事なんだ。| ほら: Come on, let's see what you can do. That's|what I'm here for. Come on, come on, come on,|come on!

158.「おお……。ついに 我が前に現れたか。| セルゲイナスの呪いすら 退ける| 類ま: Oh... At last, before me... An alchemist of|unparalleled talent who can vanquish the|curse of Sergeenus.

159.「私の名は バルザック。| 究極と呼ばれる錬金術…… とある秘法により| 自身の:
My name is Val... The ultimate in alchemy...|By means of a secret process, I was able to|transform myself into the greatest alchemist|
|of all...

160.「私は これまで 多くの錬金術師を食らい| その知識と技術を この身に宿してきた: I have eaten many alchemists, and their|knowledge and skills have become part of me.

161.「だが 食らうだけの価値がある| チカラを持った錬金術師は なかなか現れぬ。|: But there are few alchemists with the power|to make a meal of it. So I decided to raise|them myself.

162.「ククク……。この地にある ほこらはな| 未熟な錬金術師に チカラをつけさせるた: Kkkkk... The cauldron in this place is a|giant alchemy cauldron that I created to|train inexperienced alchemists.

163.「そうとも知らず 貴様は| 錬金術師としての ウデをみがき続け| こうして 私の: But you didn't know that. You've been honing|your skills as an alchemist, and now you|appear before me!

164.「残念だが このほこらの先に| 行かせるわけにはいかん！ 貴様は ここで| 我が: I'm afraid I can't let you go beyond this|hollow! You will become a part of my|alchemical power here!

165.「ふたたび 来るとは思わなかったぞ。| だが 残念ながら このほこらの先に| 行: I never thought I'd see you again. But I'm|afraid I can't let you go beyond this hollow.

166.「貴様が 私を倒し このほこらの先に| 行くことは 不可能だ！ この身体こそ|: It's impossible for you to defeat me and|reach the other side of this cave! This body|is my masterpiece of alchemy!

167.「今度こそ 貴様を食わせてもらうぞ！| 私が 究極の錬金術師となるためにな！: This time, I will have you! For I am to|become the ultimate alchemist!

169.「メラゾ熱のクスリを 作って| どうか リリオルの命を救ってやってくれ！！: Make a drug for Mellazo fever and please,|please save Liriodur's life!

170.イッショウは リリオルに|メラゾ熱のクスリを 飲ませた！: Isho has given Liriodur a dose of Melazo|Fever!

171.「<kyodai>。わしには わかっておるぞ。| お前は 時渡りの術により| こ: <kyodai>I... I know that... You came to this time|through the time traveler's trick, didn't|you?

172.「……何も言わんでよい。| このことは お前と わしの| ふたりだけの 秘密にし: ... I won't say anything... You and me, we'll|keep this between us.

|guys to find you...
